page.title: 18Cark Airfield
page.content: This old airfield has found a new lease of life as a local centre for two exciting,modern sports. Part of the field is now the base for a{Parachuting club}that offers facilities for beginners,through to the experienced sports parachutist. The club also organises charity jumps and these have proved a novel,exciting way of raising funds. At regular intervals throughout the year the airfield is used for{Motor- {Cycle}racing.These events are very popular, spectators and competitors coming from near and far. When these activities are not in progress, quiet returns and all you will find are grazing animals and birds.
